name: betti-platform
description: Betti Smart Mirror Hub - A full-stack platform for smart mirror functionality

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend
scripts.dev:video: cd backend/videochat-server && set VIDEO_PORT=8080 && node server.cjs
scripts.dev:video:ngrok: cd backend/videochat-server && set VIDEO_PORT=8080 && node server-ngrok.cjs
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:video"
scripts.dev:ngrok: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend:ngrok" "npm run dev:video:ngrok"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
